All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Card
Marker interface to represent all UNO Cards.
CardSet
Represents a set of UNO Cards.
CardUtility
Performs useful operations related to cards in the game.
Color
Represents valid UNO colors.
ColoredCard
 
Game
Models an UNO Game.
GameClient
This class represents an UNO Game client that sends a request to the game server through its main method.
GameServer
This class represents an UNO GameServer listening for a limited number of socket connections for an UNO Game.
GameStatus
 
IllegalCardStringException
 
IllegalMoveException
 
MoveProcessor
This class handles every player move made by any player of the game at any time.
NumberedCard
Represents a valid numbered (and hence colored) card of an UNO deck.
Pile
Represents a pile of UNO cards
Player
 
PlayerThread
The PlayerThread class extends Thread to associate the model.Game to a particular thread and allow the GameServer's simple socket to read from and write to the Player client.
SpecialColoredCard
Represents valid special colored cards - Draw2, Reverse, Skip
Speciality
Represents valid UNO specialities for special cards.
